snippet: Four officials have been arrested in connection with a foiled attempt to overthrow the government of Chad, the country’s state prosecutor announced Thursday.
lead_paragraph: Four officials have been arrested in connection with a foiled attempt to overthrow the government of Chad, the country’s state prosecutor announced Thursday.

headline.main: Chad: Coup Is Foiled, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Chad: Coup Is Foiled, Official Says

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
